00022 #ifdef _WIN32
00023 #pragma once
00024 #endif
00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Connections/IConnection.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Commands/LongTransaction/LongTransactionPrivilegeOperations.h>
00028 #include <fdo/Commands/ICommand.h>
00029 
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The FdoIChangeLongTransactionPrivileges interface defines the
00032 /// ChangeLongTransactionPrivileges command, which grants or revokes long
00033 /// transaction privileges for the named user. The ability to change the 
00034 /// privileges might be restricted by the datastore security if the long 
00035 /// transaction doesn’t belong to the user executing the command.
00036 class FdoIChangeLongTransactionPrivileges : public FdoICommand
00037 {
00038     friend class FdoIConnection;
00039 
00040 public:
00041     /// \brief
00042     /// Gets the name of the long transaction for which privileges should be
00043     /// changed.
00044     /// 
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns the name of the long transaction
00047     /// 
00048     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetLongTransactionName() = 0;
00049 
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Sets the name of the long transaction for which privileges should be
00052     /// changed.
00053     /// 
00054     /// \param value 
00055     /// Input the name of the long transaction
00056     /// 
00057     /// \return
00058     /// Returns nothing
00059     /// 
00060     FDO_API virtual void SetLongTransactionName(GisString* value) = 0;
00061 
00062     /// \brief
00063     /// Gets the name of the user for which to grant or revoke privileges.
00064     /// 
00065     /// \return
00066     /// Returns the user name
00067     /// 
00068     FDO_API virtual GisString* GetUserName() = 0;
00069     
00070     /// \brief
00071     /// Sets the name of the user for which to grant or revoke privileges.
00072     /// 
00073     /// \param value 
00074     /// Input the user name
00075     /// 
00076     /// \return
00077     /// Returns nothing
00078     /// 
00079     FDO_API virtual void SetUserName(GisString* value) = 0;
00080 
00081     /// \brief
00082     /// Gets the privilege flags to grant or revoke.The returned value may be
00083     /// any combination of the values from the FdoLongTransactionPrivileges
00084     /// enumeration combined via a bit-wise or operation.
00085     /// 
00086     /// \return
00087     /// Returns the privileges as a bit masked value based on FdoLongTransactionPrivileges enumeration
00088     /// 
00089     FDO_API virtual GisInt32 GetPrivileges() = 0;
00090 
00091     /// \brief
00092     /// Sets the privilege flags to grant or revoke. The privileges value may be
00093     /// any combination of the values from the FdoLongTransactionPrivileges
00094     /// enumeration combined via a bit-wise or operation.
00095     /// 
00096     /// \param value 
00097     /// Input the privileges as a bit masked value based on FdoLongTransactionPrivileges enumeration
00098     /// 
00099     /// \return
00100     /// Returns nothing
00101     /// 
00102     FDO_API virtual void SetPrivileges(GisInt32 value) = 0;
00103 
00104     /// \brief
00105     /// Gets the operation to perform, grant, or revoke.
00106     /// 
00107     /// \return
00108     /// Returns the operation to perform
00109     /// 
00110     FDO_API virtual FdoLongTransactionPrivilegeOperations GetOperation() = 0;
00111 
00112     /// \brief
00113     /// Sets the operation to perform, grant, or revoke.
00114     /// 
00115     /// \param value 
00116     /// Input the operation to perform
00117     /// 
00118     /// \return
00119     /// Returns nothing
00120     /// 
00121     FDO_API virtual void SetOperation(FdoLongTransactionPrivilegeOperations value) = 0;
00122 
00123     /// \brief
00124     /// Executes the ChangeLongTransactionPrivilege command.
00125     /// 
00126     /// \return
00127     /// Returns nothing
00128     /// 
00129     FDO_API virtual void Execute() = 0;
00130 };
00131 #endif
00132
